## MessageAggregator.addMessage() method

Adds a message to the aggregator, if defined.

**Signature:**

```typescript
addMessage(message: string | undefined): this;
```

Description

message


</td><td>

string \| undefined

The message to add - pass `undefined` or the empty string to continue without adding a message.
